description.raw:
This includes some changes to the code_check script. I first noticed that cpplint wasn't checking source code files (it was checking header files). So I fixed that, and ended up massively cleaning up the script, since there was lots of duplicated code. We should do something similar for gazebo after this is reviewed.

I also fixed cpplint errors in `Console.cc`. I exclude the urdf parser and its test from cpplint, since they have collectively over 100 errors.

title: Code check fix and clean-up
